summary:
Martik - To leverage technology and achieve your business goals, Martik offers custom software verification and development services that put you light years ahead in security for your project and community.

 MTK - Nome: martik
Simbolo: MTK

proposal:
Hello Martik Community! 👋

Ever thought of how Martik can get ahead light years not just in security but also in revenue generation? Well, we might just have the solution for you! 

We offer a suite of B2B tools that can be customized to align with Martik's vision and goals. And the best part, anyone from our community can deploy these tools. 

1. 🔄 DEX (UNI FACTORY) - Why not create your own DEX based on Uniswap V2? Control everything from colors, logo, menus, fees, to tokenlist. And the price? It's a revenue share. You don't have to pay anything upfront!

2. 🎰 Lottery - A blockchain-based lottery where you can earn 0-30% commission. It supports ETH, BSC, Polygon, and ERC20 (BEP20) tokens. 

3. 🪙 Wallet - Get a multicurrency crypto wallet for just $999. It supports Bitcoin, Ethereum, tokens and comes with features like P2P exchange via atomic swaps, customize tokens, set commissions, Visa/MC integration.

4. 🌾 Farming - Attract investment by offering rewards with ERC20 Staking & Yield Farming. It's simple, customizable, and costs only $799.

5. 🗳 DAO - Get a governance and proposals system for your MTK token at just $600. It supports Metamask, ERC20, BEP20, other EVM blockchains.

6. 🌉 CrossChain - Create an EVM compatible blockchain bridge for $1500. It's reliable, customizable, and supports all EVM blockchains.

7. 🚀 IDOFactory - Launchpad - A launchpad solution for IDO pools and token locking at just $950. You can use your MTK token for IDO pools or native coins like ETH, BNB for token lockers.

We're not just playing, we're creating. Interested? Check out our demo at https://t.me/onoutdemos. Let's boost Martik's growth together! 👋

P.S. Remember, the early bird catches the worm, but the second mouse gets the cheese. 😉
